Comment: Policy for api origin- Allows all origins for CORS requests, including preflight requests, and adds security headers
Name: header-response-for-api-app-prod-origin

ContentSecurityPolicy.ContentSecurityPolicy: frame-ancestors 'self'; default-src 'self' ; img-src 'self'  blob: https: data:; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval' 'unsafe-hashes' *.cloudflareinsights.com *.saleassist.ai *.jsdelivr.net html2canvas.hertzen.com unpkg.com *.gstatic.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' *.googleapis.com html2canvas.hertzen.com unpkg.com *.gstatic.com; font-src 'self'  'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-hashes' data: fonts.gstatic.com; connect-src  blob: gap: 'self' blob: data: * 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-hashes' 'unsafe-eval' content
